plarail.sendToTrain1.tooltip: Send an IR command with direction and speed to Train 1.

plarail.sendToTrain2.tooltip: Send an IR command with direction and speed to Train 2.

plarail.reverseTrain1Direction.tooltip: Toggle Train 1's direction between forward and reverse.

plarail.reverseTrain2Direction.tooltip: Toggle Train 2's direction between forward and reverse.

plarail.accelerateTrain1.tooltip: Increase the speed level of Train 1 by 1.

plarail.accelerateTrain2.tooltip: Increase the speed level of Train 2 by 1.

plarail.decelerateTrain1.tooltip: Decrease the speed level of Train 1 by 1.

plarail.decelerateTrain2.tooltip: Decrease the speed level of Train 2 by 1.

plarail.stopAllTrains.tooltip: Send stop commands to all trains.

plarail.onSensorEnter.block: When a train arrives at sensor ID %sensorId
plarail.onSensorEnter.tooltip: Run the handler when a train is detected at the specified sensor ID.

plarail.onSensorLeave.block: When a train leaves sensor ID %sensorId
plarail.onSensorLeave.tooltip: Run the handler when a train leaves the specified sensor ID.
